overview: When Sugarpussy executive Dino Valentino (Frank James) calls on sexy Margie Holiday (Gail F-rce) to create a commercial for his Sugarpussy Jeans, everyone wants to get into the act! Meet the flamboyant fashion designer Von Viengold (Sade) and her boys. Meet the stunning Raven (Raquel Reos) who works for the infamous industrialist J.J. Johnson. See a real life Hollywood casting session. Watch it all unfold as Margie's production company spares no expense in creating the perfect erotic sales tool.
tagline: Everything comes between you and these jeans.
title: Sugarpussy Jeans
